entry.source: My name is Mami, though you can refer to me{F801}as the Mother Goddess. I want to create a{F801}human that can work more efficiently. Please{F801}find me the giant {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0} and {F804,5}{F872,2}{F804,0}{F801}to experiment on. Give them to the Mushussu{F801}in {F804,5}Fukagawa Fudo north{F804,0} of {F804,5}Toyosu{F804,0} once you do.{F801}
